name: TonurPackstation6

infos.name: Packstation
infos.description:
Dieses Plugin bietet neben der Erweiterung für die Eingabemaske der Lieferadresse im Frontend um eine Option zur Angabe der DHL Packstationsdaten auch die Möglichkeit, Packstation und Postfilialen über Postleitzahl/Ort zu suchen und in einer Kartendarstellung auszuwählen. Durch den Zugriff auf die DHL-Datenbank sind die angezeigten Packstationen/Postfilialen stets aktuell.

Features

  • Spezielle Eingabemaske für Packstationen
  • Packstationen/Postfilialen suchen
  • Anbindung an DHL-Datenbank
  • Lieferadresse per Single-Click übernehmbar
  • Postkonforme Lieferadresse
  • Keine Anpassung einer WaWi-Schnittstelle nötig

Die Postnummer wird im Backend im Firmennamen gespeichert. Für den Straßennamen wird automatisch je nach Auswahl des Kunden "Packstation" bzw. "Postfiliale" gewählt. So kann immer eine postkonforme Anschrift generiert werden.

Probleme?

Die meisten Fragen lassen sich bereits im Vorfeld klären. Aus diesem Grund bieten wir zu jedem Plugin ein Handbuch kostenlos zum Download an und haben zudem die häufigsten Fragen in unseren FAQs zusammengestellt.
Schauen Sie in unseren Supportbereich!

Hinweis

Jede Installation bzw. jedes Update eines Plugins in Ihrem Shopware Shop stellt eine Änderung der Software dar. Trotz unserer sowie von Seiten Shopware durchgeführter Maßnahmen zur Qualitätssicherung können wir daher nicht ausschließen, dass es während der Installation oder des Updates in Ausnahmefällen zu Problemen kommen kann.

Wir empfehlen grundsätzlich neue Plugins sowie das Einspielen von Updates von bereits installierten Plugins zunächst in einer geeigneten Testumgebung zu testen und diese nicht direkt in der Live-Umgebung einzuspielen sowie regelmäßig Backups Ihrer Live-Umgebung zu erstellen.

Über Repertus

Repertus ist ihr Softwareentwicklungs- und Dienstleistungsunternehmen mit Sitz in Berlin.
Unser Angebotsspektrum reicht von der E-Commerce Standardsoftware bis hin zu innovativen, individuell angefertigten Plugin Lösungen speziell auf Ihre Bedürfnisse und Anforderungen zugeschnitten.

Bitte sprechen Sie uns an.
infos.installationManual:
Einfach das Plugin über den Plugin-Manager installieren und falls erforderlich die Plugin-Einstellung ergänzen.


Für weitere Details lesen Sie bitte das Handbuch.
infos.shortDescription: Ermöglichen Sie Ihren Kunden eine  Packstation oder Postfiliale als Versandadresse anzugeben. Die Kunden können dabei die Adresse selber eingeben oder die Suchfunktion nutzen.

infos.name: Packstation
infos.description:
This plugin offers you the option to add an address field in the frontend where you can enter the DHL Packstation information, as well as search for Packstation and post office outlets according to postal code / city and select them over a map. Since the plugin has access to DHL database, the Packstation/post office outlets listed are always up-to-date.

Features

  • Special input mask for Packstations
  • Search for Packstations/Post Offices
  • Connected to the DHL-Database
  • Accept as shipping address via single click
  • Mail-compliant shipping address
  • No adaptation of a ERP interface necessary

The post number will be saved to the company name field in backend. Depending on the selection of the customer, the street name field is automatically filled with "Packstation" or "Post office" info. This way, a post-friendly address entry is provided.

Problems?

Most questions may be answered in advance. Therefore we offer for each plugin a user manual and additionally collected the most common questions in our FAQs.

Visit our support section!

Disclaimer

Every installation or update of a plugin in your Shopware Shop constitutes a change of the software. Despite our quality assurance measures implemented by Shopware, we can not rule out that problems may arise during the installation or the update in exceptional cases.

We recommend testing new plug-ins and installing updates from already installed plug-ins in a suitable test environment, and not importing them directly into the live environment and regularly creating backups of your live environment.

About Repertus

Repertus is your software development and service company based in Berlin.
Our portfolio of services ranges from the standard e-commerce software to innovative, custom-made plugin solutions tailored to your needs and requirements.

Please contact us.
infos.installationManual: The plugin can easily be installed via the Shopware backend.
infos.shortDescription: Allow your customer to add a DHL Packstation or post office as shipping address. Customers can enter the address themselves or use the search function.

comments.text:
Sehr einfach zu installieren, alles top.
Bei Fragen antwortet der Support super schnell und hilft direkt.
Würde ich jedem weiterempfehlen.
comments.headline: Easy und fix

changelog.text: • adds a plugin setting to display the zip and the location in a combined field
• fixes a possible problem with the display of the cookie notice
• Shopware 6.5 compatibility
• SW 6.5 Compatibility
• Adds the ability to narrow down to location types
• Fixes a possible error in the communication with the DHL Location API
• Improves the handling of the address form
• Fixes a possible error when opening the cookie settings
• Use of the new DHL API "Location Finder". It is recommended to create and use your own DHL API Key.

• Made validation of the post number more robust (for access via API)
  • Fixed possible JavaScript error in post number validation in address modal window.
• Fixes an error in the RuleBuilder when missing address information
• Established compatibility to SW 6.4.12.0

• Updated BingMaps API URL
  • The DHL customer number (post number) is now validated. As in the Shopware 5 plugin, the length of the customer number is checked (between 6-12 characters). Only numbers are allowed. 
  •  The validation of the DHL customer number can be activated/deactivated in the plugin settings.
• Kompatibility with Shopware 6.4.11.0 established
• Plugin Templates extended with Twig blocks

Version 1.4.1

  • Keeps sources for frontend/administration compile
• Feature: Setting for "Do not send item to Packstation"
• New feature: RuleBuilder condition extended to include "Shipping to Packstation". The condition can now be used to prevent a shipping type from being used for packingstations.

• Added plugin setting Test mode. The test mode is activated by default and a label "Test Mode" is displayed on the BingMaps. We kindly ask you to create your own BingMaps key for the productive mode and to store it in the plugin settings.
• Added Plugin setting for requesting the packstation / post office search cookie.

• A possible problem has been resolved that at a packstation/postoffice Germany was not automatically selected as the country
  • When changing from a packstation/postoffice -> postal address, the corresponding fields are reseted
• A compatibility problem with the "Street and housenumber in 2 fields" plugin has been fixed
• Compatibility with the plugin "Street and house number in 2 fields" established
• New feature: The colors of the packstation and post office on the map can be defined in the plugin settings.
• A compatibility problem with the "Street and housenumber in 2 fields" plugin has been fixed
• Compatibility with the plugin "Street and house number in 2 fields" established
• New feature: The colors of the packstation and post office on the map can be defined in the plugin settings.
• Establishes compatibility with Shopware 6.4.0.0

• Resolves a possible problem in which the Cookie Consent Manager could not be used in the checkout.
  • Resolves a possible problem that can occur while requesting the addresses.
• Shopware 6.3.4.1 compatibility

• New feature: Added cookie setting. Before the Packstation search can be used, the cookie must be accepted.
  • Improves the error message display in the shopping cart.
  • Added plugin setting for debugging.
  • Added plugin setting for cart validating.
• Fixes a possible problem whereby a Packstation shipping address could not be changed to a normal postal address.

• New feature: You can now set whether an article can be sent to a packstation on the article in the additional fields.
  • Fixes a possible bug where a change from a packstation / post office to a postal address was not accepted.
• Fixes a possible problem that caused the map in the frontend to load permanently if no Packstation was found.
• Fixes a possible problem that the plugin setting "Plugin active" has no effect on the display in the storefront.
• Establishes compatibility with Shopware 6.3.
• Renewal of the Bing Map Credentials

• Resolves a possible problem when specifying a different delivery address
  • Resolves a possible routing problem
• The plugin now uses the HTTPS Bing Maps API
• Provides compatibility with Shopware 6.1.3
• First version of our Plugin Packstation for Shopware 6
